page.title: 12The Newsagent, Otford.
page.content: The owner and his wife work full- time and employ two part-time staff. He begins his day by collecting papers from the wholesaler at Sevenoaks station at 4.00 am. The shop opens at 6.30 am. and closes at 5.45 pm. The average number of daily papers sold is 1000.( About 100 remain unsold.) The three most popular are The Telegraph, The Mail and The times. The local paper sells about 650 copies weekly. About half of the papers sold are delivered to customers' houses. 13 youngsters deliver these. Many magazines, comics and periodicals are stocked. Other items sold include paper-backed books, sweets, crisps, ices, drinks, biscuits and cigarettes (about 200 packets daily) and stationery.
